College_Station.A&M Consolidated High School: A&M Consolidated High School, also known as "Consol", is a public high school located in the city of College Station, Texas (USA). It is classified as a 5A school by the UIL. The school is part of the College Station Independent School District located in southern Brazos County. Until the opening of College Station High School in 2012, A&M Consolidated was the only high school in College Station.
